author: Staff Reporter
text:
The labour department has warned of severe action against shops and business establishments in the district indulging in selling consumer goods over and above the Maximum Retail Price (MRP) here on Thursday.

In a release issued K. Gnanasambandhan, Labour Inspector appealed to the public to bring to the knowledge of the officials either by written or oral complaint along with original bills at the office of the Labour Inspector, No. 15, Barthavarthini Street, Ramavarmapuram, Nagercoil about such sale above MRP. For more details customers can also contact the following officials on their mobile numbers: Labour Inspector, Nagercoil – 9445398771; Deputy Labour Inspector, Nagercoil – 8608178370; Deputy Labour Inspector, Thuckalay – 94422 33082; Assistant Labour Inspectors, Nagercoil – 99657 88490, 83001 83247; Thuckalay 98659 63854 and Kuzhithurai 94425 80404, the release added.
title: Traders warned
